article:
Hi! Bill,
How are you? Last Sunday,our class had a trip.  We wanted to do _ exciting.  So,we went to the  _ near our town.  That day, the weather was  _  but not hot.  We started at eight.on the way,we talked and sang.Soon,we _ .Wow! It was really a great mountain.  I wanted to _  to the top .I wanted to see what the top was like.About an hoar later,I _ to have a rest .I 1ooked back.Oh,my friend Alice was about 100 meters  _ me. she looked very tired.I waited for her and asked her to follow me. _ about eleven, we got to the top.On it,we ate a little food and drank some water.I don't like the food and I felt it was never _ like that.There I bought something  _ my sister in a gift shop.In the evening,1 wrote a diary about the trip.
Yours,
Anna
